fields.description: Titanium build properties such as {{Ti.version}}, {{Ti.buildDate}} and {{Ti.buildHash}} are not updated on each build. It returns placeholder string for now. (See [TiModule.cpp#L32|https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile_windows/blob/master/Source/Ti/src/TiModule.cpp#L32]), should be integrated with CI build.
fields.summary: Windows: Update Ti.buildHash and Ti.buildDate properties on CI build
